short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save text snippets, and use them later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple text snippet manager extension. Save text, and copy saved items to use them later.

Use the toolbar button to access the Snippets Manager. You can also add snippets from the context menu.

Your data is saved locally on computer. Extension by BrowserNative: https://browsernative.com/snippets-manager-pastebin-chrome-extension/
